title: Web directory
description: A web directory built with React and Vite for fast and smooth navigation, connected to a WordPress backend for managing content via a REST API. The React frontend ensures quick rendering and dynamic updates, while WordPress handles content storage and management.

title: E Commerce Website
description: A full-stack website with a React frontend and a WordPress backend, connected through a REST API. The React frontend handles the user interface and dynamic interactions, while WordPress manages the content and data.
